long_description: Offering a comfortable upright position for commutes, urban rides and tours, the women's Cannondale Quick SL 2 Bike features a light "SL" frame, a smooth carbon fork and reliable Shimano components. SL version features refined, lightweight frame tubing and an integrated seat binder to save weight compared to the standard Quick frame. 6061 aluminum frame features a carbon fork for a versatile, comfortable ride on everything from jaunts around the neighborhood to century-length charity rides. Frame also features exaggerated Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) design in the seatstays and chainstays to reduce road vibration. Flat handlebar design offers an upright riding position for improved comfort and visibility. Shimano components ensure accurate, dependable shifts throughout the 18 gear combinations. Mini-V linear-pull brakes make easy work of speed management. Fast-rolling 700c wheels are outfitted with Kenda Kwick Roller Sport tires for all-around riding. Specs on the Cannondale Quick SL 2 Bike are subject to change.
short_description: Offering a comfortable upright position for commutes, urban rides and tours, the women's Cannondale Quick SL 2 Bike features a light "SL" frame, a smooth carbon fork and reliable Shimano components.
